doc.title: Can I Touch Your Breast?
doc.plot: Before permission is granted, or not, there are silent negotiations, stifled impulses, and dubious motives - but fortunately, Matt and Moksha, an ordinary couple taking up residence within the collective reality of full time television viewing, have learned to treat such potentially intimacy-inducing matters with uncharacteristic aplomb and a pragmatism to which we should all aspire.
